content:
Name

Crit Effect

Type
Off Balance You take a -2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

Melee
Friendly Fire You the ally nearest to the target.

Ranged
Something's Broken You take 1d4 bludgeoning damage, and you can't use this attack until healed.

Unarmed
Power Drain You one prepared spell or spell slot (determined randomly by the GM).

Spell
name: Critical Fumble Deck #10
